name: force-list-option
description: Forces an input's value to match the value of one of its datalist options, and then some.
author: Tyler Peterson <tylerjpeterson@gmail.com>

scripts.build: mkdir -p tmp/ && npm run js:dev && npm run js:dist
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:js
scripts.js:dist: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify ./index.js --standalone forceListOption > tmp/force-list-option.js && uglifyjs -c 'unused=false,collapse_vars=false' -r 'ret,define,module,require,exports' --screw-ie8 -- tmp/force-list-option.js > dist/force-list-option.js
scripts.js:dev: browserify -r ./node_modules/chai-as-promised/lib/chai-as-promised.js:chai-as-promised > tmp/chai-promised.js && browserify -t [ browserify-istanbul ] index.js --standalone forceListOption > tmp/force-list-option.debug.js
scripts.coverage: npm run js:dev && npm run coverage:run && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:report: istanbul report --root coverage lcov && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test: npm run js:dev && phantomjs ./node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js test/spec/index.html spec '{"useColors":true}'
